Xiaomi Interconnectivity Services allow your devices to interact with each other wirelessly. To be able to work normally, these services need to connect to the internet and require the following permissions:

Xiaomi Interconnectivity Services allow your devices to interact with each other wirelessly. To be able to work normally, these services need to connect to the internet and require the following permissions:

string.name: connect_settings_summary
string.Data: Automatically discover nearby devices signed in to your Xiaomi Account and connect them to each other to perform a variety of tasks across multiple devices. Learn more

string.name: global_privacy_detail
string.Data:
"Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using this app.
If you don't agree to use the aforementioned services, you won't be able to use some features of this app; however, its basic functionality will still be available to you."

resources.string: Welcome to Casting! This app provides the following services:
Using minimized windows, casting with the screen off, and hiding private items.
"Projecting the items from your phone's screen on a bigger external monitor."

While recording or casting, the service providing this feature can capture any sensitive information that is displayed on your screen or played from your device, including sensitive information such as audio, passwords, payment info, photos, and messages.

string.name: global_privacy_tip
string.Data: We need to collect necessary personal information to provide you with the basic services and optimize the casting process. You can learn how we handle the information we collect in our Privacy Policy. You can withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy in the Settings at any time.

resources.string: Keep casting when the screen of your device is turned off. This feature decreases power consumption. Press the Power button to turn the screen back on.
About to cast with screen off…
Earphones connected to this device. Double press to activate. Press with two fingers and drag to transfer playback.
"Casting is projecting the items from your phone's screen on a bigger external monitor. It allows you to share images and videos with your friends and family without using mobile data."
How do I cast items on a bigger screen?
Step %1$d: Check your devices and network environment
Step %1$d: Check your devices and network environment

"%1$d. Xiaomi TVs, set-top boxes, projectors: Connect both your mobile device and external monitor to the same Wi-Fi network for best effect. If they are connected to different networks, it might take more time to find the external monitor and connect. Note: Older TV models might not support casting across different networks. %2$d. If you're using TVs, set-top boxes, or projectors of other brands, connect both your mobile device and external monitor to the same Wi-Fi network. If the two devices can't be connected to the same network, turn on Miracast on your external monitor. The naming of Miracast functionality might vary."

"%1$d. Xiaomi TVs, set-top boxes, projectors: Connect both your mobile device and external monitor to the same Wi-Fi network for best effect. If they are connected to different networks, it might take more time to find the external monitor and connect. Note: Older TV models might not support casting across different networks. %2$d. If you're using TVs, set-top boxes, or projectors of other brands, connect both your mobile device and external monitor to the same Wi-Fi network. If the two devices can't be connected to the same network, turn on Miracast on your external monitor. The naming of Miracast functionality might vary."
Xiaomi TVs, set-top boxes, and projectors:

"%1$d. Make sure your mobile device and external monitor are connected to the same Wi-Fi network. %2$d. On some Xiaomi TVs, you can set up casting from the TV as well as customize device search and verification methods."
*You can set casting preferences for your TV in the casting settings.
Non-Xiaomi TVs, set-top boxes, and projectors:
"%1$d. Make sure your mobile device and external monitor are connected to the same Wi-Fi network. %2$d. On some brands of TV, you'll need to turn on Miracast to be able to cast."
"Tap the \"Cast\" toggle on your phone's Notification shade. Turn on both Wi-Fi and Bluetooth for a more stable connection."
"Tap the \"Cast\" toggle on your device's Notification shade. Turn on both Wi-Fi and Bluetooth for a more stable connection."
"Turn on casting in your device's Control center, then search for an external monitor."
If you want to cast photos, videos, games, or presentations, you can use built-in casting features in the corresponding apps.
Select an external device from the list of the available devices to start casting.
Select an external device from the list of available devices to start casting.

"%1$d. Make sure your mobile device and external monitor are connected to the same Wi-Fi network or hotspot. %2$d. Make sure the network environment is stable. If not, try restarting your router or switch to a %3$d GHz network band. %4$d. When casting to a Xiaomi TV, turn on the wireless casting feature on the TV. Stay on the casting page while connecting. %5$d. Some large public LANs such as those of companies and schools don't support the ability to discover devices on the same LAN."
"Some TVs use non-LAN connection while casting. It's normal for these devices to be disconnected from the network. They'll usually reconnect within %1$d-%2$d seconds after casting ends."

"%1$d. If you want to use a Xiaomi device, but can't find it in the list of available devices, try the following: Connect both your mobile device and the external monitor (e.g. your TV) to the same network, or connect the external monitor to your mobile device's hotspot. If there aren't any networks available or you can't connect both devices to the same network, check whether the casting features on your external monitor are up to date, turn on Bluetooth both on your mobile device and the external monitor, and turn on Miracast on your TV. %2$d. If you're casting on a Xiaomi device for the first time, you need to complete verification. %3$d. If you want to use a non-Xiaomi device, but can't find it in the list of available devices, try the following: Connect both your mobile device and the external monitor (e.g. your TV) to the same network, or connect the external monitor to your mobile device's hotspot. If this doesn't help, install the HappyCast app on your TV and follow the instructions."

"%1$d. If you want to use a Xiaomi device, but can't find it in the list of available devices, try the following: Connect both your mobile device and the external monitor (e.g. your TV) to the same network, or connect the external monitor to your mobile device's hotspot. If there aren't any networks available or you can't connect both devices to the same network, check whether the casting features on your external monitor are up to date, turn on Bluetooth both on your mobile device and the external monitor, and turn on Miracast on your TV. %2$d. If you're casting on a Xiaomi device for the first time, you need to complete verification. %3$d. If you want to use a non-Xiaomi device, but can't find it in the list of available devices, try the following: Connect both your mobile device and the external monitor (e.g. your TV) to the same network, or connect the external monitor to your mobile device's hotspot."

"You can project items from your Mi phone on most Mi TV models with Bluetooth capabilities without turning on Miracast manually. If you need to turn on Miracast, press the [MENU] button and select My apps > Casting > Miracast."

You can project items from your Xiaomi phone on most Xiaomi TV models with Bluetooth capabilities without turning on Miracast manually. If you need to turn on Miracast, press the [MENU] button and start casting by using the option for other Android phones.

First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can press the [SOURCE] button on the remote control and then select \"Screen Mirroring\". This feature is turned on by default on various models.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. This feature is turned on by default on various models.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. This feature is turned on by default on various models.

First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can press the [MENU] button on the remote control and then select Settings > Connection > Network > Multiple screens.

First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can press the [SMART] button on the remote control and then select Casting > Wireless Display. Some models also support casting for games: Hi Cast > Cast games > Android.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can select Apps > Casting > Android device > Miracast.

First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can press the [SOURCE] button on the remote control and then select \"Screen Mirroring\". On some other models, you can turn this feature on in Networks > Wi-Fi Direct. This feature is turned on by default on various models.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can select Apps > Screen Mirroring.
Check the settings of your TV to make sure that your external monitor supports Miracast functionality.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can select Apps > Wireless Display.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. To turn this feature on, go to My Apps > WiFi Display.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can turn this feature on in Settings > Networks > Multiple screens > Wireless Display.

"If you can't connect to the network, make sure your external monitor supports Miracast functionality and it's turned on. On some models, this feature is called Wireless Display, Screen Mirroring, or Multiple screens. View the information below to learn how to turn on Miracast. %1$d. If you encounter any issues, you can report them using our \"Services & feedback\" app."

"If you can't connect to the network, make sure your external monitor supports Miracast functionality and it's turned on. On some models, this feature is called Wireless Display, Screen Mirroring, or Multiple screens. %1$d. If you encounter any issues, you can report them using our \"Services & feedback\" app."
"If the brand of your device isn't listed here, contact the manufacturer to learn more about casting functionality."

string.name: privacy_detail_extra
string.Data: Some features are provided by a third party service provider HappyCast. Before using this feature, read and agree to HappyCast Privacy Policy and HappyCast Legal Statement.

resources.string: "Welcome to Casting! Casting allows projecting the items from your phone's screen on a bigger external monitor. This app needs to connect to the internet and requires the following permissions to be able to work normally:"
These permissions are required to make the basic features and services of this app available.
"Used for additional features while you're using them"
Access and save items to storage
For accessing and saving files and photos to this device

While recording or casting, the service providing this feature can capture any sensitive information that is displayed on your screen or played from your device, including sensitive information such as audio, passwords, payment info, photos, and messages
For making voice calls or recording sound

string.name: privacy_phone_read_theme_privacy_policy
string.Data: "I've read and agreed to the \"Statement on the Withdrawal of Consent to the Xiaomi Interconnectivity Privacy Policy\"."

resources.string: Agree to the terms and conditions first

"%1$d. Make sure that you have the right to withdraw consent before you continue. %2$d. After you withdraw consent, the personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. As interconnectivity services are provided based on the collection of the necessary personal information, your withdrawal of consent will be held as refusing to accept interconnectivity services. Your withdrawal of consent won't affect the normal usage of other features and services. %3$d. Withdrawal of consent is an irreversible action. Remember that you won't be able to reconsider your decision once your consent is withdrawn."
Statement on the Withdrawal of Consent to the Xiaomi Interconnectivity Privacy Policy
Read and agree to the \"Statement on the Withdrawal of Consent to the Xiaomi Interconnectivity Privacy Policy\" before withdrawing your consent.

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to the Xiaomi Interconnectivity Privacy Policy. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. As interconnectivity services are provided based on the collection of the necessary personal information, your withdrawal of consent will be held as refusing to accept interconnectivity services. Your withdrawal of consent won't affect the normal usage of other features and services."

"You won't be able to keep using casting features unless you allow us to provide our services based on the collection of the necessary personal information. Withdraw consent to HappyCast Privacy Policy anyway?"

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of HappyCast. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. As HappyCast provides its services based on the collection of the necessary personal information, your withdrawal of consent will be held as refusing to accept HappyCast services. Withdraw consent now?"
Withdrawal of consent to HappyCast Privacy Policy

string.name: privacy_text_1
string.Data: "Welcome to Casting! Casting allows projecting the items from your phone's screen on a bigger external monitor. We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies. Some features are provided by a third party service provider HappyCast. Before using this feature, read and agree to HappyCast Legal Statement and HappyCast Privacy Policy. To be able to work normally, this app needs to connect to the internet and requires the following permissions in order to collect your personal information:"

string.name: privacy_text_2
string.Data: "If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this app. You can choose to uninstall this app, sign out, or restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases. Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using this feature."
